title: The 5 most underrated games of the year
summary: PlayerUnknownâ€™s Battlegrounds is still one of the best shooter games available on the market. Marvel's Spider-Man is the first one created by Insomniac Games, the same company that made the Ratchet & Clank series. Mario Tennis Aces is the best tennis game since the classic Nintendo 64 version of Mario Tennis. Overcooked! 2 is a silly cooking game that's great for parties and family gatherings. Shadow Colossus is an action-adventure that deserves more attention.

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Video games have become a big part of our culture. Millions of people around the world play video games every day, and some even make it their career. In 2018 alone, over 200 new video games were released. It\u2019s important to keep tabs on all the new releases so you don\u2019t miss out on anything great. That being said, there are a lot of video games that aren\u2019t receiving the attention they deserve for various reasons.
Did you know that the average video game player is getting older? According to recent data, the average age of video gamers is now 35 years old! That means most gaming enthusiasts probably won\u2019t find as many underrated games as they would have when they were younger. However, there are still plenty of underrated gems out there that are well worth checking out this year! Here are the top 5 underrated video games of 2018:`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

content.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...a}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...a,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("h2",null,"PlayerUnknown\u2019s Battlegrounds"),mdx("p",null,`The game that started it all, PlayerUnknown\u2019s Battlegrounds is still one of the best shooter games available on the market. The game takes place on a massive island where 100 players are dropped to find weapons and fight in a last man standing deathmatch. The game is highly competitive, and getting good at it takes time and practice.
Players can play alone or with a team of up to three other people. Battlegrounds also has daily and weekly challenges that players can complete to earn helpful items and rewards. The game is updated regularly with new content, including new weapons and cosmetics.
If you\u2019re a fan of shooter games, this one is a must-play. It\u2019s the best of its kind, and the price tag makes it an even better deal. Players who are looking for an online shooter that offers endless hours of fun should definitely check out Battlegrounds. It\u2019s a great game for both hardcore and casual gamers.`),mdx("h2",null,"Marvel's Spider-Man"),mdx("p",null,`Looking for a superhero game that\u2019s more like an interactive movie? Then you definitely need to play Marvel\u2019s Spider-Man. The game focuses on the iconic superhero and his alter ego Peter Parker. You\u2019ll get to explore the streets of New York City as you find villains to fight.
While it\u2019s not the first Spider-Man game ever created, it\u2019s definitely one of the best. That\u2019s probably because it\u2019s the first one created by Insomniac Games, the same company that made the Ratchet & Clank series.
The visuals are stunning, and the game offers plenty of content to keep you hooked. If you\u2019re a fan of superhero games, you really can\u2019t go wrong with Marvel\u2019s Spider-Man. It\u2019s a modern masterpiece that will leave you feeling like you\u2019re in an action movie.`),mdx("h2",null,"Mario Tennis Aces"),mdx("p",null,`Mario Tennis Aces is a delightful surprise from the Mario franchise. The game brings the series back to its roots with a retro tennis gameplay that feels like a throwback to the past. It features a robust single-player campaign, as well as a multiplayer mode.
You can play the game in either single or doubles mode. Playing doubles is definitely a challenge, but it\u2019s also a lot of fun. There are even special power-ups that you can trigger during a match.
This is the best tennis game since the classic Nintendo 64 version of Mario Tennis. It\u2019s also the best retro take on tennis since the Nintendo Labo VR game. If you\u2019re looking for a fun, nostalgic game that\u2019s also easy to pick up, Mario Tennis Aces is perfect.`),mdx("h2",null,"Bombers B-game: Big Bombing Battles"),mdx("p",null,`Bombers B-game: Big Bombing Battles is a solid retro game that feels like a classic Nintendo title. The game puts you in control of a plane and tasks you with shooting enemies and dropping bombs on their bases. It\u2019s a simple game that comes with a low price tag.
The game features three different game modes, each with its own set of missions. There\u2019s also a handy tutorial that teaches you how to play the game.
The visuals are retro and pixelated, but they\u2019re also charming in a way that only classic video games can be.
If you liked Bomberman, you\u2019ll probably like this game, too. It\u2019s basically a modern version of that game, but with modern graphics and slightly different gameplay. It\u2019s a fun and easy game to play, and it\u2019s perfect for anyone who misses playing classic games from the \u201980s and \u201990s.`),mdx("h2",null,"Overcooked! 2"),mdx("p",null,`Overcooked! 2 is a silly cooking game that\u2019s great for parties and family gatherings. The gameplay is simple, but that\u2019s what makes it so fun. You and up to three other players will have to work together to prepare meals in a short amount of time.
The goal is to serve as many customers as possible. You can play alone if you want, but it\u2019s way more fun to play with other people. This game is great for parties or family gatherings because anyone can play it and everyone will have a great time.
If you want to play a silly game with family and friends, you can\u2019t go wrong with Overcooked! 2. It\u2019s tons of fun, and it\u2019s even better when you play with other people. `),mdx("h2",null,"Shadow of the Colossus"),mdx("p",null,`Shadow of the Colossus is an action-adventure game that definitely deserves more attention. The game is a remake of an older game of the same name. If you loved the original, you\u2019ll love this version too.
The game focuses on climbing giant, mystical creatures in order to defeat them. You\u2019ll control a character as he explores a vast, open world and hunts down these massive creatures.
The visuals are great, and the gameplay is intense. If you enjoy games that put you inside the main character, Shadow of the Colossus is for you.
The game is a bit short, but it\u2019s definitely worth the price. If you like adventure games, you can\u2019t go wrong with this one.`),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null," Video games are a fun way to unwind, and they can also help you improve in other areas of your life. If you\u2019re looking for a new game to play, check out these underrated games. These five games are definitely worth your time."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...a}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...a,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Word games, puzzles, board games, card games and video games. Gaming is a wonderful way for families to connect and have fun together. Many parents worry that kids who play video games for long periods of time are not interacting with other people enough. But the truth is, there are lots of great family-friendly video games out there that can be an enjoyable part of your kid\u2019s life.
We present you with the best family-friendly games released in 2018: Word games, puzzles and board games. These are some of the most engaging titles we\u2019ve played all year long. These are not educational or just slightly wholesome\u2014these are the best family-friendly games released this year that we think everyone should own as soon as possible!`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Best Games of the Year for People Who like to Win
The Best and Worst Games of the Year

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`It takes a lot of great games to make a great year. In 2018, we saw new entries in long-running series like Red Dead Redemption, Assassin\u2019s Creed, and Halo as well as brand new IP such as Monster Hunter: World, Into the Breach, and A Way Out. It was a year that saw game developers pushed by streaming services like Twitch and YouTube continue to experiment with new ideas and designs while also returning to their roots with older properties.
That being said, not all games are created equal. There are excellent games and then there are... others less so. To help you sort through the deluge of new releases this year, Gamers Central has compiled a list of our top ten favorite titles coupled with an even longer list of disappointments that you may want to avoid entirely or at least wait for a sale before picking up.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Best Games of the Year for Couples

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`It\u2019s the most wonderful time of the year. From binge-watching Christmas TV specials to baking gingerbread cookies and sipping hot cocoa, there are plenty of ways to get into the holiday spirit. And what better way to keep that good cheer going than by playing a game with your significant other?
With so many different board games available on the market, it can be challenging to figure out which ones are worth investing in. Thankfully, this list features some of the best games perfect for couples this holiday season. Whether you\u2019re looking for a light-hearted romp or an intense challenge that brings you closer as partners, these games have you covered.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Worst Games of the Year

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`The video game industry is filled with great games. These are also some of the most challenging and difficult ones to make. Cracking the code on how to build a well-crafted and engaging video game requires practice, ingenuity, skill, and patience. But not every developer is up to the task. Some simply fail at creating an entertaining experience for players. This list compiles some of the disappointments from 2018 that failed to meet an acceptable standard of quality.
These are the worst games of 2018, broken down by category and listed in no particular order. Some might have had good intentions or interesting concepts, but fell short in their execution. If you\u2019re looking for something new to play this year, stay away from these titles as they won\u2019t give you your money\u2019s worth or much satisfaction beyond finishing them once (if that).`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Top 5 Games of the Year

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...a}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...a,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"Games are a major part of our lives. We spend lots of time playing them, talking about them with friends and family, thinking about them and even dreaming about them. The games we play also reflect who we are as individuals. They serve as a mirror that reflects back an image of our unique personalities. Each one of us has different preferences and taste in games. There\u2019s also a lot to choose from, too: There are so many video games today that no individual can ever hope to try them all. That said, there are some great ones out there and they come in all shapes and sizes: Action-adventure, shooters, RPGs; you name it! Here is a list of the top 5 games this year that you must play if you haven\u2019t already:"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
